Name: Aaron Kelley

Major: Public Affairs

bio: I am a third year Public Affairs and Political Science double major. I have been involved in fencing since middle school, starting at Kiraly Fencing Academy in Akron. I've been a member of the Fencing Club at Ohio State since my freshman year. My interests outside of fencing include politics, attending concerts, collecting vinyl, and the Bee Movie.

Fencing Club at OSU

Questions? Contact one of our presidents. Dermot Hutchinson: hutchinson.267@osu.edu or Rachel Dvorak: dvorak.43@osu.edu
